name: Overworked (LilNarwhal)
description:
Important note: Not specified in tutorial, but to relive your bladder you must press shift!The Game

In this nerve racking PC game, you will need to work through emails, avoid distractions, and please your colleagues, all to avoid lapsing into a nervous breakdown. Reply to emails, answer to phone messages, have a coffee break, or simply go to the toilet, you'll need to manage your time effectively to stay healthy.


The Jam

This game was created for the occasion of the 48h 2020 GMTK game jam, with theme "Out of Control". We've attempted to follow this theme by portraying stress and the speed at which things that are normally in your control can lapse out of your reach.

The Team

The game was made by a team of 4, though the artist of the team had to leave before the deadline. On coding, Pankaku (find his work at https://pankaku.itch.io/) and myself. On art, Virtue.  And on music, Paquito, or "My Friend Emily", who scored her first game with this jam! (and SFX by me). It was really fun to make the game all together.
